line_1: My hapless Flame nor Time nor Absence cures,
line_2: Still constant to the Vows which made me yours.

line_1: Will not admit of common Cures;
line_2: Who tells me that a Case like yours

line_1: Beneath the Moon but one Elixer cures;
line_2: Fruitless her Aid, he still the wrack indures,

line_1: Meats intermingle, and no Med'cine cures.
line_2: The Better; for, where Appetite endures,

line_1: Nor Time forgets, nor Kindness cures;
